english: modal particle showing affirmation or exclamation

examples.pinyin: Nǐ lái le a！
examples.english: You came!

examples.pinyin: Tā pǎo de zhēn kuài a！
examples.english: He runs really fast!

examples.pinyin: Hǎojiǔ bù jiàn a！
examples.english: Long time no see!

examples.pinyin: Tā gèzi hěn ǎi。
examples.english: He is very short.

examples.pinyin: Zhè kē shù hěn ǎi。
examples.english: This tree is very short.

examples.chinese: 不要因为他矮就小看他。
examples.pinyin: Bùyào yīnwèi tā ǎi jiù xiǎokàn tā。
examples.english: Don't underestimate him just because he is short.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ de àihào shì dǎ lánqiú。
examples.english: My hobby is playing basketball.

examples.chinese: 每个人都有不同的爱好。
examples.pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu bùtóng de àihào。
examples.english: Everyone has different hobbies.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shénme àihào？
examples.english: What hobbies do you have?

examples.pinyin: Qǐng ānjìng yìdiǎn。
examples.english: Please be a little quieter.

examples.pinyin: Zhège dìfang hěn ānjìng。
examples.english: This place is very quiet.

examples.pinyin: Túshūguǎn lǐ xūyào ānjìng。
examples.english: You need to be quiet in the library.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ hěn è。
examples.english: I am very hungry.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ è le ma？
examples.english: Are you hungry?

examples.pinyin: Wǒmen dōu è le。
examples.english: We are all hungry.

english: to hold, to grasp; particle used for disposal

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shū gěi wǒ。
examples.english: Please give me the book.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ bǎ shuǐ dào le ba。
examples.english: You spilled the water.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ bǎ zuòyè zuò wán le。
examples.english: I have finished my homework.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ de bān yǒu sìshí gè xuésheng。
examples.english: My class has forty students.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ shì jǐ bān de？
examples.english: Which class are you in?

examples.chinese: 他每天都坐八点的班车去上班。
examples.pinyin: Tā měitiān dōu zuò bā diǎn de bānchē qù shàngbān。
examples.english: He takes the 8 o'clock shuttle to work every day.

examples.pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān yào bānjiā。
examples.english: We are moving tomorrow.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ bān zhè zhāng zhuōzi。
examples.english: Please help me move this table.

examples.chinese: 他们搬到了新的办公室。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen bān dào le xīn de bàngōngshì。
examples.english: They moved to a new office.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu bànfǎ bāng nǐ。
examples.english: I have no way to help you.

examples.pinyin: Zhège wèntí yǒu hěn duō bànfǎ。
examples.english: There are many solutions to this problem.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shénme hǎo bànfǎ ma？
examples.english: Do you have any good ideas?

examples.pinyin: Lǎoshī zài bàngōngshì děng nǐ。
examples.english: The teacher is waiting for you in the office.

examples.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen de bàngōngshì。
examples.english: This is our office.

examples.chinese: 办公室里有电脑和打印机。
examples.pinyin: Bàngōngshì lǐ yǒu diànnǎo hé dǎyìnjī。
examples.english: There are computers and printers in the office.

english: to help, to lend a hand

examples.pinyin: Xièxie nǐ bāngmáng。
examples.english: Thank you for your help.

examples.chinese: 你能帮忙照顾我的猫吗？
examples.pinyin: Nǐ néng bāngmáng zhàogu wǒ de māo ma？
examples.english: Can you help take care of my cat?

examples.pinyin: Tā zǒngshì yuànyì bāngmáng。
examples.english: He is always willing to help.

examples.pinyin: Xièxie nǐ de bāngzhù。
examples.english: Thank you for your help.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào bāngzhù。
examples.english: I need help.

examples.pinyin: Tā jīngcháng bāngzhù biérén。
examples.english: He often helps others.

examples.pinyin: Xiànzài shì bā diǎn bàn。
examples.english: It's half past eight now.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ chī le bàn gè píngguǒ。
examples.english: I ate half an apple.

examples.pinyin: Zhè píng shuǐ zhǐyǒu bàn píng le。
examples.english: This bottle is only half full.

examples.pinyin: Tiānqì biànhuà hěn dà。
examples.english: The weather changes a lot.

examples.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de biànhuà zhēn dà。
examples.english: The changes here are really big.

examples.pinyin: Shēnghuó zhōng chōngmǎn le biànhuà。
examples.english: Life is full of changes.

examples.pinyin: Tā biǎoshì hěn gāoxìng。
examples.english: He expressed that he was very happy.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng biǎoshì nǐ de yìjiàn。
examples.english: Please express your opinion.

examples.chinese: 这个符号表示什么意思？
examples.pinyin: Zhège fúhào biǎoshì shénme yìsi？
examples.english: What does this symbol mean?

examples.pinyin: Biéren dōu zǒu le。
examples.english: Everyone else has left.

examples.chinese: 我不喜欢用别人的东西。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ bù xǐhuān yòng biéren de dōngxi。
examples.english: I don't like using other people's things.

examples.pinyin: Biéren zěnme shuō bù zhòngyào。
examples.english: What others say doesn't matter.

examples.pinyin: Wǒmen zhù zài wǔxīngjí bīnguǎn。
examples.english: We are staying at a five-star hotel.

examples.pinyin: Zhège bīnguǎn de fúwù hěn hǎo。
examples.english: The service at this hotel is very good.

examples.pinyin: Bīnguǎn jiù zài qiánmiàn。
examples.english: The hotel is just ahead.

examples.pinyin: Zhè běn shū bǐjiào guì。
examples.english: This book is relatively expensive.

examples.pinyin: Bǐjiào zhè liǎng zhāng zhàopiàn。
examples.english: Compare these two photos.

examples.pinyin: Jīntiān bǐjiào lěng。
examples.english: It's relatively cold today.

examples.chinese: 昨天的足球比赛很精彩。
examples.pinyin: Zuótiān de zúqiú bǐsài hěn jīngcǎi。
examples.english: Yesterday's football match was exciting.

examples.chinese: 我们学校要举行篮球比赛。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen xuéxiào yào jǔxíng lánqiú bǐsài。
examples.english: Our school is going to hold a basketball competition.

examples.chinese: 他在比赛中得了第一名。
examples.pinyin: Tā zài bǐsài zhōng dé le dì-yī míng。
examples.english: He won first place in the competition.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ bìxū ànshí wánchéng zuòyè。
examples.english: You must complete your homework on time.

examples.pinyin: Wǒmen bìxū zūnshǒu guīzé。
examples.english: We must obey the rules.

examples.chinese: 这件事情必须今天做完。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiàn shìqíng bìxū jīntiān zuò wán。
examples.english: This matter must be completed today.

examples.pinyin: Tiānkōng biànchéng le hóngsè。
examples.english: The sky turned red.

examples.chinese: 他变成了一个成功的商人。
examples.pinyin: Tā biànchéng le yí gè chénggōng de shāngrén。
examples.english: He became a successful businessman.

examples.pinyin: Bīng biànchéng le shuǐ。
examples.english: Ice turned into water.

examples.pinyin: Bīnkè men dōu dào qí le。
examples.english: All the guests have arrived.

examples.chinese: 这家饭店对宾客很热情。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā fàndiàn duì bīnkè hěn rèqíng。
examples.english: This restaurant is very cordial to guests.

examples.pinyin: Hūnlǐ shàng yǒu hěn duō bīnkè。
examples.english: There are many guests at the wedding.

examples.pinyin: Zhège bēizi shì bōli zuò de。
examples.english: This cup is made of glass.

examples.chinese: 小心，别碰那个玻璃花瓶。
examples.pinyin: Xiǎoxīn, bié pèng nàge bōli huāpíng。
examples.english: Be careful, don't touch that glass vase.

examples.pinyin: Nà shàn chuānghu de bōli hěn zāng。
examples.english: The glass in that window is very dirty.

examples.pinyin: Tā hěn cōngmíng, bùguò yǒudiǎn lǎn。
examples.english: He is clever, but a bit lazy.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ zhīdào, bùguò wǒ bù tóngyì。
examples.english: I know, but I don't agree.

examples.chinese: 这本书很好，不过太贵了。
examples.pinyin: Zhè běn shū hěn hǎo, bùguò tài guì le。
examples.english: This book is good, but too expensive.

examples.chinese: 服务员，请给我一份菜单。
examples.pinyin: Fúwùyuán, qǐng gěi wǒ yí fèn càidān。
examples.english: Waiter, please give me a menu.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ kàn guò càidān le ma？
examples.english: Have you looked at the menu?

examples.chinese: 这家餐厅的菜单有中文和英文。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng de càidān yǒu Zhōngwén hé Yīngwén。
examples.english: This restaurant's menu has Chinese and English.

examples.pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ de cǎo hěn lǜ。
examples.english: The grass in the park is very green.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bùyào cǎi cǎopíng。
examples.english: Please don't step on the lawn.

examples.pinyin: Chūntiān lái le, cǎo kāishǐ shēngzhǎng。
examples.english: Spring has come, and the grass has begun to grow.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài sān céng。
examples.english: I live on the third floor.

examples.pinyin: Zhège dàngāo yǒu sān céng。
examples.english: This cake has three layers.

examples.pinyin: Tā jiā zhù zài zuì gāo de yì céng。
examples.english: His family lives on the highest floor.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ de kǎoshì chéngjì hěn chà。
examples.english: My test score is very poor.

examples.pinyin: Wǒmen de xiǎngfǎ chàbuduō。
examples.english: Our ideas are similar (not much different).

examples.chinese: 我们还差五分钟就到了。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen hái chà wǔ fēnzhōng jiù dào le。
examples.english: We'll arrive in five more minutes (five minutes short).

examples.pinyin: Wǒ yào qù chāoshì mǎi dōngxi。
examples.english: I'm going to the supermarket to buy things.

examples.chinese: 这家超市的东西很便宜。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā chāoshì de dōngxi hěn piányi。
examples.english: The things in this supermarket are very cheap.

examples.pinyin: Chāoshì qī diǎn kāimén。
examples.english: The supermarket opens at 7 o'clock.

examples.pinyin: Zhè jiàn báisè chènshān hěn héshì。
examples.english: This white shirt fits well.

examples.pinyin: Tā chuān le yí jiàn lánsè chènshān。
examples.english: He wore a blue shirt.

examples.pinyin: Zhè jiàn chènshān duōshǎo qián？
examples.english: How much is this shirt?

examples.chinese: 努力工作是成功的关键。
examples.pinyin: Nǔlì gōngzuò shì chénggōng de guānjiàn。
examples.english: Hard work is the key to success.

examples.pinyin: Tā de yǎnchū hěn chénggōng。
examples.english: Her performance was very successful.

examples.pinyin: Zhù nǐ chénggōng！
examples.english: I wish you success!

examples.pinyin: Běijīng shì yí gè dà chéngshì。
examples.english: Beijing is a big city.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zhù zài chéngshì lǐ。
examples.english: I like living in the city.

examples.chinese: 这个城市的交通很方便。
examples.pinyin: Zhège chéngshì de jiāotōng hěn fāngbiàn。
examples.english: Transportation in this city is very convenient.

examples.pinyin: Duìbùqǐ, wǒ chídào le。
examples.english: I'm sorry I'm late.

examples.pinyin: Tā zǒngshì chídào。
examples.english: He is always late.

examples.chinese: 如果你迟到，老师会生气的。
examples.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ chídào, lǎoshī huì shēngqì de。
examples.english: If you are late, the teacher will be angry.

english: to set off, to start out

examples.chinese: 我们明天早上六点出发。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen míngtiān zǎoshang liù diǎn chūfā。
examples.english: We will set off at 6 a.m. tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 他们已经出发去机场了。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen yǐjing chūfā qù jīchǎng le。
examples.english: They have already set off for the airport.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng zhǔnshí chūfā, bié chídào。
examples.english: Please depart on time, don't be late.

examples.pinyin: Zhè shì chūjí Hànyǔ kèběn。
examples.english: This is an elementary Chinese textbook.

examples.pinyin: Tā hái zài xuéxí chūjí Yīngyǔ。
examples.english: He is still learning elementary English.

examples.chinese: 这个游戏对初级玩家很友好。
examples.pinyin: Zhège yóuxì duì chūjí wánjiā hěn yǒuhào。
examples.english: This game is very friendly to beginner players.

examples.pinyin: Chúle Xiǎo Wáng, dàjiā dōu lái le。
examples.english: Everyone has come except for Xiao Wang.

examples.chinese: 除了周末，我每天都去跑步。
examples.pinyin: Chúle zhōumò, wǒ měitiān dōu qù pǎobù。
examples.english: I go jogging every day except on weekends.

examples.chinese: 除了钢琴，她还会弹吉他。
examples.pinyin: Chúle gāngqín, tā hái huì tán jítā。
examples.english: Besides piano, she can also play guitar.

examples.pinyin: Māma zài chúfáng zuòfàn。
examples.english: Mom is cooking in the kitchen.

examples.pinyin: Zhège chúfáng hěn dà, hěn piàoliang。
examples.english: This kitchen is very big and beautiful.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢在厨房里尝试新菜。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zài chúfáng lǐ chángshì xīn cài。
examples.english: I like trying new dishes in the kitchen.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zuò chuán lǚxíng。
examples.english: I like traveling by boat.

examples.pinyin: Nà sōu chuán shì wǒ yéye de。
examples.english: That ship belongs to my grandfather.

examples.pinyin: Hé shàng yǒu hěn duō xiǎo chuán。
examples.english: There are many small boats on the river.

examples.pinyin: Chūntiān lái le, huār kāi le。
examples.english: Spring has come, and the flowers are blooming.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ zuì xǐhuān chūntiān de tiānqì。
examples.english: I like spring weather the most.

examples.chinese: 春节是中国最重要的节日。
examples.pinyin: Chūnjié shì Zhōngguó zuì zhòngyào de jiérì。
examples.english: Spring Festival is China's most important holiday.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yì běn Hàn-Yīng cídiǎn。
examples.english: I need a Chinese-English dictionary.

examples.pinyin: Zhè běn cídiǎn hěn yǒuyòng。
examples.english: This dictionary is very useful.

examples.chinese: 你可以在词典里查这个词。
examples.pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ zài cídiǎn lǐ chá zhège cí。
examples.english: You can look up this word in the dictionary.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ de háizi zhēn cōngming！
examples.english: Your child is so clever!

examples.chinese: 她是班上最聪明的学生。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì bān shàng zuì cōngming de xuésheng。
examples.english: She is the most intelligent student in the class.

examples.chinese: 那只狗非常聪明，会做很多动作。
examples.pinyin: Nà zhī gǒu fēicháng cōngming, huì zuò hěn duō dòngzuò。
examples.english: That dog is very smart and can do many tricks.

examples.pinyin: Tā jīntiān dǎban de hěn piàoliang。
examples.english: She is dressed up beautifully today.

examples.chinese: 我们要打扮房间迎接新年。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen yào dǎban fángjiān yíngjiē xīnnián。
examples.english: We need to decorate the room to welcome the new year.

examples.chinese: 小女孩喜欢打扮她的娃娃。
examples.pinyin: Xiǎo nǚhái xǐhuān dǎban tā de wáwa。
examples.english: The little girl likes to dress up her dolls.

examples.chinese: 我打算明年去中国旅游。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ dǎsuàn míngnián qù Zhōngguó lǚyóu。
examples.english: I plan to travel to China next year.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ dǎsuàn shénme shíhou jiéhūn？
examples.english: When do you intend to get married?

examples.chinese: 他们打算买一套新房子。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen dǎsuàn mǎi yí tào xīn fángzi。
examples.english: They plan to buy a new house.

examples.pinyin: Bié dānxīn, yíqiè dōu huì hǎo de。
examples.english: Don't worry, everything will be fine.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ dānxīn tā de jiànkāng zhuàngkuàng。
examples.english: I'm worried about his health condition.

examples.chinese: 妈妈总是担心我的学习。
examples.pinyin: Māma zǒngshì dānxīn wǒ de xuéxí。
examples.english: Mom always worries about my studies.

examples.chinese: 这是我给你买的生日蛋糕。
examples.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ gěi nǐ mǎi de shēngrì dàngāo。
examples.english: This is the birthday cake I bought for you.

examples.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕是我的最爱。
examples.pinyin: Qiǎokèlì dàngāo shì wǒ de zuì'ài。
examples.english: Chocolate cake is my favorite.

examples.pinyin: Tā huì zuò hěn hǎochī de dàngāo。
examples.english: She can make very delicious cakes.

examples.chinese: 你当然可以来参加我的生日派对。
examples.pinyin: Nǐ dāngrán kěyǐ lái cānjiā wǒ de shēngrì pàiduì。
examples.english: Of course, you can come to my birthday party.

examples.pinyin: Dāngrán, wǒ hěn lèyì bāngzhù nǐ。
examples.english: Of course, I'm happy to help you.

examples.pinyin: Tā dāngrán zhīdào zhè jiàn shì。
examples.english: Of course, he knows about this.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ dēng dǎkāi。
examples.english: Please turn on the light.

examples.pinyin: Fángjiān lǐ yǒu yì zhǎn dēng。
examples.english: There is a lamp in the room.

examples.pinyin: Lùdēng hěn liàng。
examples.english: The streetlights are very bright.

examples.pinyin: Tā de tóu hěn dī。
examples.english: His head is low.

examples.pinyin: Zhège jiàgé tài dī le。
examples.english: This price is too low.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shēngyīn tiáo dī yìdiǎn。
examples.english: Please turn the volume down a little.

examples.pinyin: Zhège dìfang hěn piàoliang。
examples.english: This place is very beautiful.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuān shénme dìfang？
examples.english: What place do you like?

examples.pinyin: Wǒ zhǎo bù dào zhège dìfang。
examples.english: I can't find this place.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ zuò dìtiě qù shàngbān。
examples.english: I take the subway to work.

examples.pinyin: Dìtiězhàn jiù zài fùjìn。
examples.english: The subway station is nearby.

examples.pinyin: Zuò dìtiě hěn fāngbiàn。
examples.english: Taking the subway is very convenient.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yì zhāng dìtú。
examples.english: I need a map.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng zài dìtú shàng zhǎo dào Běijīng。
examples.english: Please find Beijing on the map.

examples.pinyin: Zhè zhāng dìtú hěn jiù le。
examples.english: This map is very old.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng zuò diàntī shàng lóu。
examples.english: Please take the elevator upstairs.

examples.chinese: 电梯坏了，我们走楼梯吧。
examples.pinyin: Diàntī huài le, wǒmen zǒu lóutī ba。
examples.english: The elevator is broken, let's take the stairs.

examples.pinyin: Diàntī lǐ hěn jǐ。
examples.english: The elevator is very crowded.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ fā diànzǐ yóujiàn。
examples.english: Please send me an email.

examples.chinese: 我每天都收到很多电子邮件。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ měitiān dōu shōudào hěn duō diànzǐ yóujiàn。
examples.english: I receive many emails every day.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ de diànzǐ yóujiàn dìzhǐ shì...
examples.english: My email address is...
